attributes.action: Abolish The Compulsory Micro-chipping of our Dogs!
attributes.additional_details:
According to the Government, "Every dog owner in England will have to microchip their animal by April 2016"

This to me Is Absurd, and seems like a hungry grab for more power.

We don't need our Dogs Chipped! and even if we did, it should be a choice not a law..

What next? Start chipping every bird in the sky & fish in the Sea?

Madness.

I call upon the Government to abolish this law or at least make it an option.
